name: Untitled (Prototype)
description:
Controls WalkWASD AscendSpaceDescendShift Camera Rotate
Mouse Camera Zoom
Mouse Wheel

The game locks your cursor when you click in its window so that the camera can rotate freely. Press Escape  to release your cursor.

Troubleshooting

If the game runs slowly, you might not have hardware acceleration enabled in your browser settings. Enabling hardware acceleration allows your browser to make use of your computer's GPU for graphics calculations (which is typically faster) instead of running everything on the CPU.

To enable hardware acceleration:

  • in chrome: https://www.howtogeek.com/412738/how-to-turn-hardware-acceleration-on-and-off-in...
  • in firefox: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/performance-settings
